```{r, include=FALSE}
# **************************************************************************** #
# ***************          INR Format and Spaghetti           **************** #                  
# **************************************************************************** #

#INR - INR

hep_b_sag <- hep_b_clean[, c(1:8)]
hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 1` <- as.Date(hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 1`, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 2` <- as.Date(hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 2`, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 3` <- as.Date(hep_b_sag$`Date of HbSAg Titer 3`, format = "%Y-%m-%d")
hep_b_sag$date2 <- as.numeric(hep_b_sag[[6]] - hep_b_sag[[4]])
hep_b_sag$date3 <- as.numeric(hep_b_sag[[8]] - hep_b_sag[[4]])

#age grouping
hep_b_sag <- hep_b_sag %>%
  mutate(
    age_group = case_when(
      `Age in Years` >= 30 & `Age in Years` <= 50 ~ "30–50",
      `Age in Years` >= 70 & `Age in Years` <= 90 ~ "70–90",
      TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  )

#making data frame
n <- nrow(hep_b_sag)
plot_data <- data.frame(
  id = rep(1:n, each = 3),
  days = as.vector(t(cbind(
    rep(0, n),         # Day 0 for titer 1
    hep_b_sag$date2,   # Day for titer 2
    hep_b_sag$date3    # Day for titer 3
  ))),
  titer = as.vector(t(cbind(
    hep_b_sag$`HbSAg Titer 1`,
    hep_b_sag$`HbSAg Titer 2`,
    hep_b_sag$`HbSAg Titer 3`
  ))),
  age_group = rep(hep_b_sag$age_group, each = 3)
)


```
